normalised: **electric vehicle Charging Gets a Festive Boost!**

unnormalised: Hey folks, feeling the electric buzz this Onam? Good, because EV charging is getting some serious love! A new charging station just popped up near Marine Drive in Kochi, thanks to Bharat Charge. They're promising super-fast charging – juicing up your Tata Nexon EV enough to get you to Thrissur in under an hour.
normalised: Hey folks, feeling the electric buzz this Onam? Good, because electric vehicle charging is getting some serious love! A new charging station just popped up near Marine Drive in Kochi, thanks to Bharat Charge. They're promising super-fast charging – juicing up your Tata Nexon electric vehicle enough to get you to Thrissur in under one hour.

unnormalised: Speaking of long drives, remember that Bangalore-Chennai road trip you've been planning? Well, IIT Madras is reportedly working on a smart charging grid that dynamically adjusts charging speeds based on demand. Think of it like adjusting the spice level in your biryani – just the right amount!
normalised: Speaking of long drives, remember that Bangalore-Chennai road trip you've been planning? Well, I I T Madras is reportedly working on a smart charging grid that dynamically adjusts charging speeds based on demand. Think of it like adjusting the spice level in your biryani – just the right amount!

unnormalised: Plus, rumour has it that Reliance is planning a nationwide rollout of EV charging points. They're aiming for a charging station every 50 km on major highways. Imagine – no more range anxiety! Some are even saying they might subsidize charging during festivals. Now that's what I call a Diwali gift! Early estimates suggest you can charge at Rs. 10/km.
